description: CORCAN needs a supplier for Gloves wool/nylon for a 36-month period with optional extensions. Deliverables should be sent to Laval, Quebec
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Standing Offer: RFSO Gloves, Wool and Nylon
### Solicitation Number: WS3979121001

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting contractors to submit proposals for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply of Gloves, Wool and Nylon. The contract is managed by Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) for the end-user.

### Details of the RFSO
*   **Solicitation Type:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Open)
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods (Prixverit)
*   **UNSPSC Code:** 53102504 (Gloves or mittens)

#### Terms and Conditions
*   The RFSO contract includes an option to purchase additional quantities during a period of 36 months from the Standing Offer award.
*   All deliverables must be delivered to Laval, QC.

#### Contact Information

Mathieu Hevey, Contract Officer, PSPC, can be reached at:

*   Email: mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17713109?extsite=MTc3MTMxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17713109?extsite=MTc3MTMxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Requirements
The contractor must provide:

*   High-quality gloves made of wool and nylon, 
*   all delivered to Laval, QC,

with a standing offer valid for 12 months from the date of award, with extensions to order additional quantities for 36 months.

Documents:
Complete instructions for bidding can be found on the above-mentioned website [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17713109?extsite=MTc3MTMxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17713109?extsite=MTc3MTMxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Important Dates
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 9, 2024 at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time
